txt.en: 'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. That is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Embers soon!'
'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. This is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Motes soon!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will remove 15 Marks of the Longbeards.</rgb>
Talk to the Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster
Talk to the Talk to the Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster
Talk to the Talk to the Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster
The Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster has a small quantity of Motes available.
Talk to the Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster to trade Longbeard Marks for Motes.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
'If you are looking for Motes, I have just a few. I would be willing to part with them if you have any Marks of the Longbeards.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
'If you are looking for Embers, I have just a few. I would be willing to part with them if you have any Marks of the Longbeards.'
'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. That is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Embers soon!'
'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. That is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Embers soon!'
Talk to the Dwarf-holds Rewards Quartermaster
